Author: karmarell
Text: I wonder if this method is science based. Human body measurements vary A LOT. There are people for example with a narrow torso but wider limbs or vice versa. I think looking at someone's A) shoulders B) ribcage and C) hips width and D) the shape of their limbs gives a more holistic estimation of their frame size :)
